General.Name: Amana Cooperative Insurance Co
General.Description: Amana Cooperative Insurance Company provides various insurance products in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers medical, motor, property, and casualty insurance, as well as accident, fire, marine, land shipments, and engineering insurance products. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

7.Name: Amal  Al Onazi
7.Title: Chief of HR & Support Services Officer
